content: For the third quarter of fiscal 2022, we reported revenue of $32.3 million, an increase of 89%, when compared to $17.1 million for the third quarter of fiscal 2021, and down 4% sequentially as compared to $33.7 million reported in the second quarter of fiscal 2022. Selling general and administrative expenses for the third quarter of Fiscal 2022, were $8.3 million, compared with $5 million for the third quarter of fiscal 2021, and $8.9 million for the second quarter of fiscal 2022. Research and development expenses for the third quarter of fiscal 2022 were $4.5 million compared with $2.5 million in the third quarter of fiscal 2021, and $4.3 million for the second quarter of fiscal 2022. GAAP net loss was $3.2 million, or $0.09 per share, during the third quarter of fiscal 2022, compared to a GAAP net loss of 1.2 million, or $0.04 per share, during the third quarter of fiscal 2021. non-GAAP net income was $2.8 million, or $0.08 per share, during the third quarter of fiscal 2022, compared to non-GAAP net income of $1.5 million, or $0.05 per share, during the third quarter of fiscal 2021. Working capital decreased to $51.8 million as of March 31st, 2022, as compared with $62 million in the prior quarter. For the full fiscal year 2022, we are now targeting annual revenue of a $125 million to a $129 million, representing growth in the range of 75% to 80%. To that point, shipments late to customer expectations in Q3 totaled just over $7 million, up from $5.7 million as compared to the second quarter. And looking to fiscal 2023, we continue to expect -- we will begin shipping the now Quantum Edge device as we have stated in the past, this large design win, which we have conservatively estimated contribution at $10 million to $20 million in revenue for fiscal '23 alone.
